name: 複合動力車輛
goals: Understand the basic principles and architectures of hybrid vehicles and fuel cell hybrid vehicles.
Familiar with the operation and terminology of hybrid vehicle sub-systems.
Learn the state-of-the-art development of hybrid vehicles.
Develop talents for green vehicle technology and R&D.
syllabus:
第1週: Course Introduction

第2週: Hybrid Vehicle Architecture

第3週: Vehicle Dynamics

第4週: Engine and Transmission

第5週: Battery System

第6週: Electric Drive System

第7週: Electric Vehicle Technology

第8週: Mid-Term Exam

第9週: Series and Parallel Hybrid Electric Vehicles

第10週: Power-Split Hybrid Electric Vehicles

第11週: Plug-In Hybrid Electric Vehicles (PHEV)

第12週: Energy Management and Controls

第13週: Design Aspects of Hybrid Vehicles

第14週: Fuel Cell System

第15週: Fuel Cell Hybrid Vehicles

第16週: Final Exam
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
